title: Duo
subtitle: For Contrabassoon and Piano
description: The Duo for Contrabassoon and Piano was commissioned by Henry Skolnick. It involves continual variation of material and, despite the use of serial methods of pitch organization which partially determine the character of certain sections, there is often the hint of a kind of extended tonality. After a succession of abrupt textural contrasts the music eventually takes on a focus of continuity and momentum which culminates in a surprisingly light-hearted stylistic allusion before losing control and collapsing into a relatively sedate close.
